default_date.tooltip: The date on which all routes will start

travel_mode.tooltip: Choose the mode of transportation from your ArcGIS Online Org

time_zone_usage_for_time_fields.labelText: Time Zone Usage for Time Fields
time_zone_usage_for_time_fields.tooltip: Specify the time zone for the input date-time fields

impedance.tooltip: Impedance for the route. If travel mode is set, this value is overridden. See REST API docs

time_units.tooltip: Specify the time units for all time based attribute values

distance_units.tooltip: Specify the distance units for all distance based attribute values

domain.text: Allow at dead ends and intersections only

uturn_policy.tooltip: Restrict the use of U-turns. If travel modes are set, this value is overridden. See REST API docs.

time_window_factor.tooltip: Rate the importance of honoring time windows without causing violations

spatially_cluster_routes.tooltip: Specify is orders assigned to an individual route are spatially clustered

route_zones.tooltip: Enter URL to REST query to specify areas that delineate work territories for given routes

route_renewals.tooltip: Enter URL to REST query to specify intermidate depots that routes can visit to reload cargo
